text: Harry Kim (born 1939) is an American politician. He is the Mayor of Hawaii County since December 2016. He served as Mayor from 2000-2008. Prior to his election, he was the county's civil defense director. While Kim first ran for mayor as a Republican, he considers himself to be nonpartisan. ==References== ==Other websites== * Video interview with Harry Kim Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:American mayors Category:American military personnel of the Vietnam War Category:Independent politicians in the United States Category:Politicians from Hawaii Category:Military people from Hawaii
title: Harry Kim (politician)
